sub_title: Principal consultant and owner of PSP Petrophysics
summary:
Senior petrophysicist and Petroleum Engineering team leader with a track record on project delivery. 35+ years of international experience in operational petrophysics, integrated subsurface studies, coaching and project management.

Specialties: Subsurface data acquisition and evaluation, also in HPHT environment. 
Tight gas petrophysics and Petroleum Engineering. 
Petroleum Engineering integration.
Project management.
Coaching and mentoring.
